Node.definition: = a type of song (שִׁיר) probably to be accompanied by musical instruments
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= action by which someone performs an event quickly
= to make an effort to hear the words spoken by someone else
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message
= state in which an object is firmly and immovably located in a certain place
= action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness
= substance ◄ made from tree gum or bark ► to make a sweet smell; it is burned in a censer or on an open fire ≈ to provide a sweet aroma pleasing to God

Node.gloss: to spread out one's hands > to pray
Node.definition: literally: to spread out or lift up one's palms; hence: = to present one's prayer and supplication before God by showing him one's empty hands
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice

= the time of day when the sun starts going down, when people leave their work and go home, have food, and go to sleep; this is also the time of the evening sacrifice, and the time when an unclean person who has gone through the cleansing rituals is declared clean, when fasting and mourning come to an end, and when the exposed body of an executed person needs to be removed
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
= a hinged barrier at the entrance to a building or room; ≈ used metaphorically to denote a person's lips with special focus on the lip's ability to shut the mouth

Node.gloss: to cause (someone's) heart to turn|to cause (someone) to focus their attention
Node.definition: literally: to cause (someone's) heart to turn aside; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to focus their thoughts and attention on a person, deity or activity
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong
= a pattern of activities performed by a person or deity, with the primary focus on whether these activities are good or evil
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen
= great wickedness and depravity, as a trait of certain human beings, which is expressed in thoughts, words, and actions; ≈ regarded as unacceptable and worthy of punishment by God
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= action by which humans ingest food
= food with qualities that inspire appreciation, ≈ used figuratively to denote the prosperity of evil people
= action by which humans or animals deliver a blow to an object with their hands, whether or not with the help of an instrument such as a hammer (הַלְמוּת) or with their feet
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior

= state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received
literally: to judge; hence: = action by which humans or deities inflict a penalty on others as retribution for what they have done

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= causative action by which humans use their influence or authority to keep something from happening

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness
= state in which an event is morally and/or ethically wrong, resulting in a state of guilt and, eventually, hardship and suffering
= actions by which humans let go of an object held in their hands, ► so that it will fall
literally: hand; hence: = pertaining to the location to the left or right of an object ◄ analogous to the location of someone's hands or arms
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
= state in which conditions and circumstances have qualities that inspire appreciation

Node.gloss: to split|to cleave|to rip open|to cut|to rend|to maul|to divide|to break through
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities or human cause an object to split, either partially or completely, either by supernatural means or by violence

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength
= the entrance to the world of the dead

= abode of the dead, a place of darkness and silence, located deep in the earth and inaccessible, where there is neither compassion nor wisdom; ≈ regarded as a place that is never satisfied; often personified; going there before one's time is considered a punishment

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
= action by which humans who find themselves in difficult circumstances put their trust in someone else, ► in order to find protection or safety
literally: to lay bare; hence: = causative action by which deities remove their protection from humans

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

Node.gloss: to watch over|to guard|to be in charge of|to take care of|to protect|to tend|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= causative action by which someone tries to gain control over someone else in an unjust way, ◄ as if that person were an animal caught in a net or trap
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= action by which a person or deity carries out some purposeful activity, in order to create something or cause something to happen
= great wickedness and depravity, as a trait of certain human beings, which is expressed in thoughts, words, and actions; ≈ regarded as unacceptable and worthy of punishment by God
= process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control
= net of unknown size and shape; ► used for hunting animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
